mapper.select: SELECT A.RES_NO , A.ROOM_NO , A.EMP_NO , A.MEET_TITLE , A.MEET_GOAL , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , B.EMP_NAME FROM RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE RES_STATUS = 'Y' AND TO_DATE(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') > SYSDATE AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}

SELECT RES_NO , A.ROOM_NO , A.EMP_NO , MEET_TITLE , MEET_GOAL , START_DATE , END_DATE , EMP_NAME , ROOM_NAME , DEPT_NAME FROM RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN MEETING_ROOM C ON A.ROOM_NO = C.ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE RES_STATUS = 'Y' AND RES_NO = #{resNo}

SELECT EMP_NO , A.RES_NO , MEET_TITLE , START_DATE , END_DATE , ROOM_NAME FROM RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN MEETING_ROOM B ON A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO WHERE RES_STATUS = 'Y' AND TO_DATE(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') > SYSDATE AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY RES_NO
SELECT * FROM MEETING_ROOM ORDER BY ROOM_NO
